title: Georgia communities receive infrastructure loans totaling $12 million (GEFA - Georgia Environmental Facilities Authority)
text: ( Source : GEFA - Georgia Environmental Facilities Authority ) ATLANTA - Eleven Georgia communities were awarded financing totaling $12,354, 701 for water, water supply, sewer and wastewater infrastructure improvements by the Georgia
